article.title: Rewards Tracker Highlights Business Travel Benefits
article.author: Rachel Lilly
article.abstract: If you travel frequently for business or for pleasure, chances are you're earning some kind of rewards—from frequent flyer miles to hotel and credit card points. But are you tracking all these loyalty programs and getting the most from your memberships?
article.text: If you travel frequently for business or for pleasure, chances are you're earning some kind of rewards—from frequent flyer miles to hotel and credit card points. But are you tracking all these loyalty programs and getting the most from your memberships?AwardWallet for iOS and Android is a free program that tracks all your accounts on one screen. Let the app monitor your progress and notify you when your balances change or before the points expire. Once you've logged in, the data is available in an offline mode, so you can track travel plans and accounts without an Internet connection.
